ticket.title: xtask Stage X2: gate GitHub status writes behind explicit dev flag

tickets.reason: Stage X1 must land before gating behavior changes.

in_scope: Gate GitHub status writes behind explicit dev flag (strict mode).
Preserve current behavior in non-strict mode to keep dev workflows usable.
out_of_scope: Full removal of GitHub status writes (Stage X3).

steps: Add allowlist flag (CLI/env) for status writes.
Fail-closed in strict mode when flag is missing.

criteria: Strict mode blocks status writes without explicit dev flag.
With dev flag, status writes proceed unchanged.
Non-strict mode preserves existing behavior with warning.

notes.security:
Status writes must be explicitly authorized; default is fail-closed in
strict mode while preserving dev usability.
notes.general: Stage X2 introduces explicit gating while keeping xtask usable.
